description:
I cleaned up both the guitar parts to make them more legible and also fixed a few of the timings and stuff, so should be a lot better there.

I added more to the bass track, it turns out every chorus is different slightly, so that's noted down now. I also fixed the bass tuning to how it was tuned for Themata. The bass track is ludicrously difficult to play lol.
title: Themata

description:
The bass track on this was a complete mess, there were some bits completely missing, some bits wrong, all the rests weren't efficiently noted (really not important but it bugged me lol). I've pretty much redone the whole thing. 
Hope this helps all the other bass players out there!
Enjoy :D
title: Themata

description: Removed live intro (theres a seperate tab for that) also adjusted chorus slightly.
title: Themata

description: Best thing I found for now... some guitars should be keyboard (I think), but someone who plays keyboard should do that.
title: Themata
